entry.summary: 吴说获悉，OKX 发布 TRX 交割合约下线的公告。OKX 表示，考虑到市场原因和用户需求，计划于近期逐步停止 TRX 币本位及 U 本位交割合约的生成，并于 2023 年 9 月 30 日下午 4 : 00 (UTC+8) 正式下线 TRX 交割合约。

entry.title: Re https://twitter.com/IM_23pds/status/1643498749803786240
entry.summary:
Re https://twitter.com/IM_23pds/status/1643498749803786240
23pds: 其实除了我们一直提的交互时eth_sign风险,我发现钱包、交易App 都存在一个通用性安全问题：钱包、交易App 如果没有引入设备特征做加密，那么一旦攻击者把本地文件拖走放到别的设备就有被运行的风险。 这个问题似乎 99% 的钱包、交易App都没做安全设计。

entry.title: 吴说获悉，慢雾 CISO 23pbs 发文指，钱包、交易App 都存在一个通用性安全问题：钱包、交易 APP 如果没有引入设备特征做加密，那么一旦攻击者把本地文件拖走放到...
entry.summary: 吴说获悉，慢雾 CISO 23pbs 发文指，钱包、交易App 都存在一个通用性安全问题：钱包、交易 APP 如果没有引入设备特征做加密，那么一旦攻击者把本地文件拖走放到别的设备，就有被运行的风险。这个问题似乎 99% 的钱包、交易 APP 都没做安全相关的设计。

entry.summary: 瑞士第五大金融服务公司 PostFinance 表示与受监管的数字资产服务提供商 Sygnum Bank 建立了合作伙伴关系。PostFinance 由瑞士政府全资拥有，将首先为其 250 万客户提供购买、存储和销售BTC和ETH 等领先加密货币的途径，未来将添加更多加密货币。（CoinDesk）https://www.coindesk.com/business/2023/04/05/swiss-government-owned-bank-postfinance-to-offer-customers-crypto/

entry.summary: Deribit 的母公司 Sentillia 领投了荷兰加密货币交易所 Finst 的 400 万欧元（440 万美元）种子轮融资，资金将用于扩大 Finst 的产品范围，以推动其国际扩张计划。Finst 声称其平均费用比在荷兰中央银行注册的八家交易所低 82%。（CoinDesk） https://www.coindesk.com/business/2023/04/05/deribit-parent-company-leads-44m-seed-funding-round-into-dutch-crypto-exchange-finst/?utm_campaign=coindesk_main&utm_content=editorial&utm_term=organic&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter

Guy Berger: 3/ Hiring is still a little elevated relative to what we'd expect given the unemployment rate, but much less than a year ago. Hires rate is consistent with an unemployment rate ~2.8%. A year ago, I would have said "consistent with an unemployment rate less than 1%"! https://t.co/1A7VGXvFGS

entry.title: If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on ...
entry.summary:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m. https://twitter.com/balajis/status/1636797265317867520
Balaji: I will take that bet. You buy 1 BTC. I will send $1M USD. This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k. The term is 90 days. All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation. If someone knows how to do this… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1636797265317867520 https://t.co/6Aav9KeJpe
